titleInfo.title: Assessing fifth grade children's rational number knowledge in a non-verbal application context: the darts game

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Wachsmuth, I., Bright, G.W., Behr, M.J., Post, T.R.: Assessing fifth grade children's rational number knowledge in a non-verbal application context: the darts game. Recherches en didactique des mathématiques. 7, 51-74 (1986).
